name: Magyker Duels
description:
A small Bullet Hell Fighting game where players take control of Magykers, powerful magic wielders who must duke it out to be the most powerful of all. Gameplay focuses on using magic attacks to send bullets and projectiles at your opponent on the other side of the screen while dodging their attacks as well.

Meant for 2 players, requires an XBox controller, or one of an extremely similar kind, and a keyboard for play.

--\\--\\--

My first Game Jam project from Fall of 2019,  created by a team of five people.

I designed the characters, worked on the story, and created the character, attack, and other various art assets.
